name: OGS Mahjong
description:
This script will install "OGS Mahjong" full edition with support for modern computer configuration. 
During install please let all options by default.
More about this game: https://sourceforge.net/projects/osrpgcreation/
notes:
- Version 1.1.0 full edition.
- Known issue: do not use network game features, they do not work because the server no longer exists and it may crash the game.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/
content:
custom-name: OGS Mahjong full edition
files:
- install: https://master.dl.sourceforge.net/project/osrpgcreation/Mahjong/1.1.0/ogs-mahjong-full-1.1.0-linux64.tar.lzma
- installaddons: https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/raw/master/OGS%20Mahjong/OGS%20Mahjong_addons.zip
game:
  exe: mj
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: install
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    format: tar
    src: $CACHE/ogs-mahjong-full-1.1.0-linux64.tar
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/
    src: installaddons
